name: Frail Hearts Collection
description:
Frail Hearts: Versicorae Domlion is an old-school JRPG with a deep and mysterious storyline placed in a fictional dark city of Gris. Explore the story of four troubled souls and kill the abominations that threaten the existence of reality itself.

Dive into the obscure atmosphere of the game with the base game and these DLCs:

  • Gorgeous artbook with different artists' drawings and monster’s designs
  • Soundtrack created by the folk band Undreamed
  • Special strategy guide with a step-to-step walkthrough and lore
